reviews.review: [h1] The game has some random stupid stuff, but it's fun because you need to use your brain effectify to mindgame the killer or survivors. That makes it such a fun game, but I don't like that you don't have communication between random teammates. [/h1]
Tunnel, Camp, Bad Servers, Cancer Killers. Just what you need. And there is Legion and vomit girl which u ll hate to play against. Nothing fun evolves around them. Ä°ts just pure cancer. PURE
Fun, easy to learn.. Good game for horror fans with at least 3 friends to play with as a survivor.

Ich finde das Spiel sehr zufriedenstellend, doch bette ich weiterhin auf den Tag wo das Spiel Ã¼ber erkaufte Server lÃ¤uft und nicht Ã¼ber einen Host, da wenn der Host eine schlechte Ping hat es jeder direkt zu spÃ¼ren bekommt.
Alot of fun. Saw some reviews saying the community is toxic, but I've only had a positive experience so far.
Literally 90% of my time "playing" this game is waiting for a game or waiting for a match to load. SSD, i5 8900k, 16g  3000mhz ram and a 1060 6gb
amazing game. it starts getting really fun when you get to rank 16 but besides that the game is very fun and exciting.
Este es un gran juego con un problema de balance, muy entretenido y adictivo muy recomendado, espero que lo balanceen pronto.

10 Ğ¥ĞĞ ĞĞ’ĞĞ”ĞĞ’ Ğ˜Ğ— 10

Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical game that will have you either really hooked or make you uninstall in a few games.

Your main goal as a survival is to repair 5 generators that are placed around various maps while a killer(controlled by someone else, mind you) is going around trying to stop you and sacrifice you to the entity by any means.

The main thing i love about this game is playing with friends and having solid communication like call outs of what the killer is doing and trying to coordinate tactical moves. Every now and then, some funny blunders happen and we all end up dying for doing something stupid.

If you love a challenge, playing killer definitely offers a good mix of challenging yet rewarding game play in which you can outplay 4 other individuals in their attempt at escaping you.

The characters are for the most part a joy to look at, though i wish every character felt more unique aside from the cosmetics you can get for them. A traditional class system for the characters or their skills only tied to them like the killers would make for some interesting game play and balancing, but what the game offers currently is totally fine.

Overall, the game is great and i highly recommend, especially if youre a fan of classic horror slasher movies and whatnot.

The only downside for me is the community. Not as a whole, but you will your fair share of people you wished you never stumbled upon.

8/10

fix the game, quit rushing crap
get rid of boons, make the game so fucking boring

Pure cheese and rage inducing. The community is littered with 10 year olds screaming git gud every single match. Its the only game ive seen that has worse trolls than overwatch. The game mechanincs are so cheap and the survivors are the ones who hunt the killer. If your older than 15 stay away from this spongebob squarepants nonsense. Fun game for 9 bucks for about 15 hours then you start to see the its massive flaws. I literally only play this game to facecamp little jerk survivors and listen to them cry about not letting them win. Wish i never bought dlc they dont deserve anymore money than the sale price.

Dead by Daylight isn't a perfect game, but it IS an extremely fun game, especially if you're playing with friends.  You may not like the play-style that some players employ, but that's to be expected with any multiplayer online game.  Just move on to the next round.  The recent addition of the in game store was brilliant, I just wish that the skins were a little cheaper.

Also, the Twitch community for this game is fantastic and worth checking out if you don't already.  I have spent more hours lurking/hanging out in DBD streams than I have played in the game, and I've met a lot of really awesome folks.  This game is addicting.

GLHF, see ya in the fog.

[Updated review] good game, really great idea and concept. not executed the best, games a bit too competitive and there are too many nuclear options and cheap strats for both sides making it unfun for alot of games. but when you get a fun game, oh boy its hella fun, also games been out for about 4 years and we havent gotten an additional game modes. if another game mode was added or stuff got spiced up a bit this game would be an even bigger hit than it already is. still really fun. 9/10

The game has potential, but the developers prefer to release "skin collections" instead of fixing the whole game. In 2017, it was fun to play and there was an atmosphere - the game was better with a horror effect (even after 1000h of losses). Currently, the game is not a multiplayer horror game for me, and an ordinary game in which I play  out of sentiment for good old DBD. Lots of streamers, ytbers are leaving and I fully understand their. The game has not been developed for several months. Items and skins from events that took place in 2017/2018 are available to everyone, because the old player is on a par with the type, which will spend a lot of money on event skins in the game store.
I wish you a nice game to people who still want to play it and I feel sorry for the people who recently bought and cannot return her.ğŸ¤ğŸ»
Take Memento mori out of the game and than I might actually rate this positely.

Recomiendo Dead by Daylight porque es un juego en el que debes ser estratÃ©gico tanto como superviviente y como asesino. A continuaciÃ³n describirÃ© los aspectos positivos y negativos:
LO BUENO:
-Juego competitivo con sistema de rangos (de 20 a 1) e insignias( son cuatro dependiendo de si juegas como superviviente o asesino), perfecto para aquellos a los que les gusta exigirse a si mismos.
-Rituales diarios: son "misiones" que puedes cumplir para obtener puntos de sangre extra.
-PersonalizaciÃ³n de tu personaje. Los desarrolladores dieron ahora mÃ¡s opciones a la personalizaciÃ³n con la nueva tienda en donde se pueden comprar cosmÃ©ticos y personajes con fragmentos irisados o con auricells.
-Variedad de supervivientes y asesinos asÃ­ como de mapas, objetos y accesorios.
-El juego te llena de adrenalina tanto si juegas como superviviente y como asesino. Por ejemplo, cuando vas escapando del asesino, cuando este pasa muy cerca de donde estÃ¡s escondido y no te ve o cuando estÃ¡s persiguiendo a un superviviente y solo piensas en atraparlo.
-Juego en constante actualizaciÃ³n con nuevos contenidos.
-Con respecto a la tienda, los cosmÃ©ticos y personajes que se pueden adquirir en ella se pueden hacer con fragmentos irisados (se consiguen dependiendo de la duraciÃ³n de cada partida) o con auricells ("monedas" que se obtienen comprando con dinero real).
LO MALO:
-Hay algunos asesinos camperos. Lo mÃ¡s gracioso es que algunos lo justifican: "si no quieren que campee no hagan gen rush", "si no quieres que campee no me hagas pallet loop", etc. Puede que en casos excepcionales como en el caso de que te toque jugar contra un supervivente que estÃ© usando hacks estÃ© justificado que lo campees o lo tunelees. Personalmente, considero que campear es una prÃ¡ctica sucia que arruina la experiencia del juego, la partida se torna aburrida.
-Supervivientes tÃ³xicos que se creen OchiDo y sus amigos, usualmente forman parte de premades. Puedo dividirlos en dos partes: los que perjudican a sus compaÃ±eros y los que se "burlan" del asesino haciendo tbag. Los primeros harÃ¡n cualquier cosa para hacerte la partida imposible como hacer ruido a propÃ³sito para que el asesino vaya a tu posiciÃ³n, hacerte bodyblock en lugares cerrados o peor aÃºn, cuando el asesino te persigue, etc. Los segundos se pasarÃ¡n toda la partida fastidiando al asesino y llamando su atenciÃ³n por cualquier medio, por lo general son los que hacen tbag luego de tirar un palÃ© o cuando estÃ¡n en la puerta de salida. 
-Los rage quiters. Son los jugadores que se desconectan de la partida cuando van perdiendo. Como superviviente estÃ¡n los que se desconectan cuando fallaron la prueba del decisive strike o cuando los tumban y saben que ya van en su tercer cuelgue. Como asesino estÃ¡n los que se desconectan cuando no mataron a ningÃºn superviviente, cuando le rompieron sus tÃ³tems de maleficio o en cualquier situaciÃ³n que consideren difÃ­cil. Mi consejo es que, si vas a desconectarte de la partida, que sea cuando de verdad lo necesites, no cuando te dÃ© una rabieta porque vayas perdiendo.
-El juego sigue teniendo bugs aunque solo me he topado con uno en todas las veces que juguÃ©, la mayorÃ­a de otros bugs los vi en videos o capturas.

En conclusiÃ³n, recomiendo Dead by Daylight porque, aunque es un juego desequilibrado (4 vs 1), no deja de ser emocionante y mejor todavÃ­a si lo juegas con amigos. A pesar de algunos jugadores que contribuyen a empeorar la experiencia del juego, estos siempre van a existir. Lo que uno debe hacer es aprender a lidiar con ellosy seguir adelante.

The game has gotten better over the years. They had added some new customizable costumes which makes the game better for obvious reasons because people wanna be unique and stick out from the rest. This game is solely based on four things. 1. Fixing generators 2. Being altruistic as in saving/healing other players 3. being bold and distracting the killer 4. SURVIVAL! 

I recommend this game to anyone who likes multiplayer horror games because its fun to play with friends or alone~

great game, but the community is a bit dodgy. 


dont be *that* survivor
If you love to run, buy this game

The game is extremely fun but can also be equally as stressful. I don't play very often so I'm usually in the lower ranks. As a killer, it's often that I am pair with 4 high ranked survivors, usually in a group with friends (which very well destroys the premise of the game)  Yeah, you'll get stomped, which isn't a problem. The players afterwards are a special type of toxic. You won't always get them but when you do, oh boy. Just turn off chat. If your profile is open too public comments, you can 100% expect people to go right to your profile and BM on you for whatever reason. 

I end up playing as survivor most of the time because being a killer is a coin flip on if you'll have fun or not. Which sucks because being a killer is where most of the fun is for me, at least.

Soooooo much fun to be had in this game. Play with our without friends, you will enjoy your time surviving and escaping the killer or taking on the role of the ruthless antagonists your self. Does not get old especially due to the incentive given to the players through all the perks, items and add ons that can be acquired.

Well, it's the best game I've ever played. 
Maybe "DBD" is something like "Friday the 13th", but it's much better, at least because there is no voice chat. 
Frankly I'm not going to compare the two games and explain completely why "DBD" is better, because it was Done By Others :) 
The first time I heard about this game was in 2015 when there was a demo-version, and I liked it so so much)). And finally in 2018 I was able to get this game for free and I wasn't disappointed in the deed at all. Free period I wasn't enough and I didn't spare the money in the end to buy DBD. 
Fortunately (for me), there's nothing I don't like in the game. It's gorgeous, 10/10.
